explains: adj. 坚定自信的，果断的

sentences.en: Be assertive and spell out exactly how you feel.
sentences.cn: 自信点，把你的真实感受详细说出来。

sentences.en: Women have become more assertive in the past decade.
sentences.cn: 妇女在过去十年已变得更坚定自信。

sentences.en: It helps people to be successful and assertive.
sentences.cn: 它帮助人们获得成功和自信。
